title: Job Club - AI Career Accelerator
description: Accelerate your AI career at NJIT with Job Club. Get mentored, build your portfolio, and land your dream role.
author: NJIT Job Club

jobclub.tagline: Turn Students Into Career-Ready AI Professionals
jobclub.mission: Provide a guided, automated onboarding experience that connects NJIT students to Discord, events, mentoring, and learning resources to build modern professional portfolios.
